PortableHole.Description: A shimmering, enchanted piece of fabric that opens a portal to a pocket dimension. Reusable.
AstralPylon.Description: Strengthens the planar connection of your Portable Hole, increasing the size of the space inside.
DimensionalCoupling.Description: An anchoring device used when traveling between dimensions. Adds a second entrance to your Portable Hole.
gmcm.SecondDoorKey.name: SecondDoorKey
gmcm.SecondDoorKey.tooltip: Hold this key when placing your Portable Hole to open the secondary entrance instead of the main one. Only applicable when you have access to a second entrance.
gmcm.DoNotDisturb.name: DoNotDisturb
gmcm.DoNotDisturb.tooltip: Prevent other players from entering your hole.
